entity.name: President Trump announces ‘hard hitting’ sanctions on Iran
entity.description: President Trump said he’s imposing sanctions on Iran’s supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, and his office, “in response to Iran’s increasingly provocative actions.” The announcement comes after Iran shot down a US Navy drone last week.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Highest number of deaths from #COVID19 in the world, popularity and election polls slump, economy tanking. So he needs to start a war to distract and a rise in popularity. Last time it was Iran. This time it's the American people
